alert.note: Alert for Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 12:44PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Elko County through 115 PM PDT... At 1243 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles east of Lee. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. Localized moderate to heavy rainfall that could produce localized flooding. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range Lamoille Canyon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range
